comment.body: I do not think Reddit is the place for that :) If you want my advise look for language exchange on FB, there plenty. Good luck
Let s go to a pub youll hear all lithuanian you possibly can
I would be interested in a tandem parter. ☺️ I’m a Lithuanian living in Paris and want to practice my French too. DM me if interested
Google translate can help you with pronounciation - it works quite well for Lithuanian.
